text: It s okay to have these thoughtsListen amp x B I live a pretty reasonably happy life  by most definitions amp x B But I feel like I should just end this  because I can clearly see there is no proper meaning to things amp x B But there are still a few things that stop me from doing so amp x B And it sure as hell ain t family  because my family  while nice and loving  are still bullshit  and do not connect with me amp x B And it is also not my friends exactly  because while nice and living  they still don t connect with me  amp x B amp x B amp x B The reason is only me amp x B amp x B amp x B amp x B Yes  I feel alone when I post this amp x B And maybe I will get banned and or removed  but to me the strongest thing that keeps me going is myself amp x B Because the reality is that NO ONE will get  you  as much as yourself  but that s okay amp x B  One time I thought I had a friend that would get  me  but that turned out to be untrue amp x B But that is okay  They are still a friend  They just cannot get all of me  Only  I  can get all of me  and  I  am my greatest  closest friend I have  Just like  you  are the greatest  closest friend you have amp x B Don t underestimate the value of the self  Of how much YOU get YOU  And no one else may understand that fully amp x B But that s okay  Understanding is not necessary for ACCEPTANCE amp x B My friends ACCEPT me  regardless of my actions and feelings  or how much they may understand me  And I hope you can find friends who see that too  You will find them  eventually  Look in strange places  if you have to  Don t worry about the judgement of others amp x B I would like to see that in yourself  I would support you doing just that  You have me as a friend  at least amp x B amp x B Thank you  and good luck  my friends amp x B  me

text: Never compliment someone s weight lost Never compliment someone for losing weight  even if you know there are actively trying to any other reason  you never know what you re actually complimenting   Last summer I saw a friend of mine and she lost a lot of weight  Before lockdown she was really hot   from my beauty standard  and had an ideal body type  She did a lot of sport and it was shown  When I saw her that skinny I felt bad for her and we were talking about that and she told me that because of quarantine she wasn t able to exercise so she lost all her muscle mass and that was the reason for her being so skinny  She talked about it as a bad thing not a positive  I didn t know what to do so I told her that she looked fine and for me she was gorgeous and that being skinny suited her face and she shouldn t worry about it because once she could resume sports she would gain muscles again  I also told her that I was planning on trying to lose weight because I had gained a few pounds  I just thought I had make a nice comment until not long after She told me that she was in the hospital because of anorexia nerviosa and she was in the psychiatric part so her phone was going to be taken away  It was a hard time for me  I was scared since I didn t know anything more and the worst part was remembering that I had complimented her ED
